name: collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<collections::btree::node::marker::Owned, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::LeafOrInternal>::clear_parent_link

collections::btree::node::NodeRef::<coll.doc:
Mutably borrows the owned root node. Unlike `reborrow_mut`, this is safe
 because the return value cannot be used to destroy the root, and there
 cannot be other references to the tree.
Borrows exclusive access to the leaf portion of a leaf or internal node.

doc: Clears the root's link to its parent edge.
